content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with Mid-Summer Lunacy, from Barrie Craig Confidential Investigator. That one first aired August 17, 1954.

(30:00) Our second story is The Waterfront Felons, the December 2, 1949, episode of This Is Your FBI.
